title: ISRO Successfully Launches GSAT-24 Communication Satellite
description: India's space agency deploys GSAT-24 to strengthen regional communications and broadcasting services.

title: New AI Model Exceeds GPT-5 Benchmarks in Reasoning Tests
description: A research team publishes an AI that outperforms current benchmarks on complex reasoning tasks.

title: Apple Announces Vision Pro 2 With Major Upgrades
description: Apple unveils the Vision Pro 2 featuring improved optics, battery life and collaborative spatial features.

title: India Records Highest Solar Power Production in History
description: Nation-wide solar output peaks, reflecting rapid capacity growth and favourable weather conditions.

title: Tesla Unveils New Electric Bike Concept in Berlin
description: Tesla reveals an urban electric bike prototype blending the company's EV design language with lightweight e-mobility.

title: Google Adds Hindi & Tamil Support to Gemini Live AI
description: Real-time spoken and written support for Hindi and Tamil expands Gemini Live's reach across South Asia.

title: Scientists Discover Earth-Like Planet in TRAPPIST-1 System
description: A newly characterised planet in the TRAPPIST-1 system shows signs of temperate conditions and a rocky surface.

title: Meta Introduces Ultra-Realistic Avatars for VR Meetings
description: Meta showcases avatars with detailed facial expressions and natural motion to improve virtual collaboration.

title: WHO Releases Updated Report on Global Nutrition 2025
description: The WHO publishes a comprehensive report highlighting global nutrition trends, challenges and recommendations for 2025.

title: Amazon Launches Drone Delivery Service in Bengaluru
description: Amazon begins a pilot drone delivery service in Bengaluru to speed up small-package logistics in select neighbourhoods.

title: Japan Hit by 6.8-Magnitude Earthquake, Tsunami Warning Issued
description: A strong 6.8 earthquake struck Japan’s northeast region early today, prompting emergency tsunami alerts and widespread transportation disruption.

title: UN Chief Warns Climate Change Is “Accelerating Beyond Predictions”
description: The UN has issued a severe climate warning, stating that global warming is advancing faster than scientific models expected.

title: Apple Introduces Next-Gen AI Assistant for iPhone
description: Apple unveiled a revolutionary AI assistant for iPhones, offering real-time reasoning, personalization, and offline intelligence.

title: India & China Hold High-Level Peace Talks After Border Tension
description: India and China conducted high-level military talks addressing ongoing border frictions in Ladakh.

title: NASA Confirms Water Ice in Lunar South Pole Region
description: NASA scientists confirmed significant water-ice deposits in the Moon’s south pole, a breakthrough for future lunar missions.

title: Global Stock Markets Dip After Latest US Inflation Figures
description: World markets fell after US inflation rose unexpectedly, raising fears that interest-rate cuts may be delayed.

title: UK Unveils New AI Safety Regulations for Tech Companies
description: The UK announced strict new AI safety regulations to govern deployment of advanced AI systems.

title: Saudi Arabia Announces New Futuristic Smart Mega-City
description: Saudi Arabia revealed a massive next-generation smart city project powered by AI and renewable energy.

title: WHO Reports Major Decline in Global COVID-19 Cases
description: The WHO announced a worldwide drop in COVID-19 infections and hospitalizations.

title: Global Electric Vehicle Sales Hit Record High in 2025
description: EV sales worldwide reached record highs driven by cheaper batteries and expanded charging networks.

title: The Thunder Boy: Rise of Aayden Storm
description: Aayden discovers he can summon lightning after a mysterious storm hits his village.

title: ShadowGirl: The Night She Learned to Disappear
description: A shy schoolgirl gains the power to vanish into shadows.

title: Robot Brothers: Operation Steel Hearts
description: Two teen inventors accidentally create sentient robot brothers.

title: Luna Wolf: Guardian of the Moon Temple
description: A girl raised by wolves is chosen by a Moon Temple to become the next guardian.

title: Captain Neon: The Boy Made of Light
description: A boy gains neon-energy powers after touching a cosmic crystal.

title: The Time-Traveling Cycle
description: A magical bicycle lets a boy travel through time and destiny.

title: The Crystal Dragons of Arkanos
description: Three siblings awaken legendary elemental dragons beneath the earth.

title: Zero Gravity Girl
description: A girl gains anti-gravity powers after a lab accident in space.

title: The Phantom Painter
description: A boy can bring paintings to life — but so can the villain chasing him.

title: Planet Zygor: The Last Star Rangers
description: Five teens are chosen to defend an alien world from cosmic invaders.

title: City Park Reopens After Renovation
description: The central city park reopened with new accessible paths and native plantings.

title: Reflections on Slow Living
description: Notes on why slowing down helps creativity and focus.
